system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Clipaeus-Class Combat Servitor
Apt: None
system.descriptionText:
Clipaeus-Class Combat Servitor's Primary Function. As Long as Character is within Comms Range, Comrade makes Standard Melee Attack against target in melee range. If Comrade is in Cohesion, gains +10 to Weapon Skill Test.
Attack Orders have Attack Action Subtype, counts as Player's Attack for the turn.
